wikipedia_page.main: William Rickford Collett (1810–1882) was a British mine owner and Conservative politician.Collett was elected Conservative Member of Parliament for Lincoln at the 1841 general election and held the seat until 1847 when he stood for election but was defeated.

response: His father, Ebenezer John Collett, was also Tory MP for  from 1814 to 1818, and then  from 1819 to 1830. He was also brother of William Rickford Collett, MP for  from 1841 to 1847.
